data.name: Droid Warfare
data.detailed_description:
A Science-fiction war game based on future alien-tech invasions and a international world hero. An exoplanet named Pumara is a highly resourceful world & is civilized by cybernetic androids. An army of Alien- based Androids launches an international invasion in attempt to take control of the planet. The citizens of Pumara formed an alliance to fight the alien forces & to protect their planet.

Player has 6 Different weapons
* The Power Gun
* Laser Gun
* Laser Blaster
* Shock Laser Gun
* Smart Laser Gun
* Grenade Gun

Controls
(Mouse & Keyboard)
WASD or Arrow Keys = Move / Side-step player.
Mouse Axis Movement = Rotate Player.
Shift Key = Run (while moving forward)
Left Mouse Button = Shoot projectiles.
C Key = Crouch player. (Zoom & Aim)
1 - 6 Keys = Switch weapons.
Space = Jump.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64- bit (7, 8,8.1 ,10 ,11)
  • Processor: CPU @ 3.3 GHz Quad Core or HigherÂ 
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo-Compatible Sound Chip
  • Additional Notes: This game is in Early Access. System Requirement may change.
